message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you the opportunity to purchase this amazing product. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. Is this something you'd be interested in?
Alice, your product seems great but $18,000 is a bit steep for me. I'd be happy to pay $15,500.  What do you think?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I can offer it to you for $16,800. Is that more in line with what you're looking for?
Alice, I appreciate your flexibility, but $16,800 is still a bit high for me. I'm willing to go up to $16,000.  This is my final offer.

I understand you're trying to get a good deal, Bob, but I've already compromised a lot. I'm willing to sell it to you for $16,200. This is my final offer, but I'm willing to negotiate further if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
